data.author: zjed

changelog.release_notes:
- added treatment history delete from treatment history list
- added configuration API secret to allow deletion of Nightscout entries
- long press select on input card allows treatment time to be entered 
- removed saving to timeline as it does not work offline

- last 24 hours of treatments are saved on local storage so all functionality to record/review treatments and IOB can be used when there is no internet. Nightscout and Timeline will not be updated when there is no internet.
- access treatment history by an up/down long press when on the treatment input card. Up shows all treatments, down shows treatments for current treatment type
- various bug fixes
- fix IOB showed -1 when no iob

Release 1.1 
- bypass menu when only 1 treatment is defined 
- add current IOB to insulin treatment page 
- add time and amount of last insulin treatment

data.description:
A Pebble watchapp to quickly record treatments locally and optionally update Nightscout.
Up to 5 assignable treatments can be defined along with their initial value and increment value.

Configure your Nightscout website/API secret and select IOB or COB for the treatment to be added to Nightscout.
PinIt is designed to be assigned as a shortcut and will close once a reading is entered.

The last 24 hours of treatments are saved locally.
 
On the treatment input card, the following actions and displays are available :-
- treatment history can be shown by a long press up or down, long press up shows all treatments, long press down shows treatments for the current type. A selected historic treatment can be deleted. 
- treatment time can be entered by a long press of select (normal press saves at current time)
- treatments assigned as IOB will display the current IOB and last treatment.
data.title: PinIt
